name: vul
friendlyName: Vul: Take control of your application security
description: Vul is the worldâ€™s most popular open source vulnerability and misconfiguration scanner. It is reliable, fast, extremely easy to use, and it works wherever you need it.
author: Khulnasoft Security

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Vul Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of Vul to use

inputs.name: docker
inputs.label: Run Vul using the khulnasoft/vul docker image
inputs.helpMarkDown: This can be useful when being rate limited by dockerhub etc.

inputs.name: debug
inputs.label: Enable Debug
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable debug logging in build output

inputs.name: path
inputs.label: The path to scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: The specified path will be scanned using an 'fs' scan type. If this option is used, the 'image' option cannot be set.

inputs.name: loginDockerConfig
inputs.label: Use Docker login task DockerConfig
inputs.helpMarkDown: Use DOCKER_CONFIG ENV as DockerConfig (set by Docker login task).

inputs.name: image
inputs.label: The image to scan
inputs.helpMarkDown: The specified image will be scanned using an 'image' scan type. If this option is used, the 'path' option cannot be set.

inputs.name: severities
inputs.label: The severities (CRITICAL,HIGH,MEDIUM,LOW,UNKNOWN) to include in the scan (comma sperated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The specified path or image will be scanned for the provided serverities.

inputs.name: ignoreUnfixed
inputs.label: Ignore unpatched/unfixed vulnerabilities
inputs.helpMarkDown: This means you can't fix these vulnerabilities even if you update all packages.

inputs.name: exitCode
inputs.label: Exit code when Vul detects issues.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set this to 0 to prevent the build failing when Vul detects issues.

inputs.name: aquaKey
inputs.label: Khulnasoft API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Khulnasoft API Key is used to upload scan results to your Khulnasoft Security account.

inputs.name: aquaSecret
inputs.label: Khulnasoft API Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Khulnasoft API Secret is used to upload scan results to your Khulnasoft Security account.

inputs.name: devMode
inputs.label: Enable development mode (used for internal testing)

inputs.name: options
inputs.label: Additional Options
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional flags to pass to Vul command line.
